10-Day Advanced SQL Plan for Data Engineering 💪

Day 1: Recap Core SQL (Joins, GROUP BY)
Day 2: Window Functions (RANK, LAG, LEAD)
Day 3: Common Table Expressions (CTEs, recursive queries)
Day 4: Subqueries (nested, correlated)
Day 5: Set Operations (UNION, INTERSECT, EXCEPT)
Day 6: Advanced Joins (self-joins, FULL OUTER)
Day 7: Analytical SQL (time-series, running totals)
Day 8: Query Optimization (indexes, EXPLAIN plans)
Day 9: Advanced Aggregations (PIVOT, hierarchical data)
Day 10: Real-World Data Science Project (SQL with Python/R)
